00008 if(!function_exists('str_getcsv')) {
00009  function str_getcsv($input, $delimiter = ',', $enclosure = '"',
00010                      $escape = "\\", $eol = '\n') {
00011   if(is_string($input) && !empty($input)) {
00012    $output = array ();
00013    $tmp = preg_split("/" . $eol . "/", $input);
00014    if (is_array($tmp) && !empty($tmp)) {
00015     while ( list ( $line_num, $line ) = each($tmp) ) {
00016      if (preg_match("/" . $escape . $enclosure . "/", $line)) {
00017       while ( $strlen = strlen($line) ) {
00018        $pos_delimiter = strpos($line, $delimiter);
00019        $pos_enclosure_start = strpos($line, $enclosure);
00020        if(is_int($pos_delimiter) &&
00021           is_int($pos_enclosure_start) &&
00022           ($pos_enclosure_start < $pos_delimiter)) {
00023         $enclosed_str = substr($line, 1);
00024         $pos_enclosure_end =
00025          strpos($enclosed_str, $enclosure);
00026         $enclosed_str = substr($enclosed_str, 0,
00027          $pos_enclosure_end);
00028         $output [$line_num] [] = $enclosed_str;
00029         $offset = $pos_enclosure_end + 3;
00030        } else {
00031         if(empty($pos_delimiter) &&
00032            empty($pos_enclosure_start)) {
00033          $output [$line_num][] = substr($line, 0);
00034          $offset = strlen($line);
00035         } else {
00036          $output [$line_num][] =
00037           substr($line, 0, $pos_delimiter);
00038          $offset = (!empty($pos_enclosure_start) &&
00039          ($pos_enclosure_start < $pos_delimiter)) ?
00040          $pos_enclosure_start : $pos_delimiter + 1;
00041         }
00042        }
00043        $line = substr($line, $offset);
00044       }
00045      } else {
00046       $line = preg_split("/" . $delimiter . "/", $line);
00047       
00048       // Validating against pesky extra line breaks creating
00049       // false rows.
00050       if(is_array($line) && !empty($line[0]))
00051        $output [$line_num] = $line;
00052      }
00053     }
00054     
00055     return $output;
00056    }
00057    else
00058     return false;
00059   }
00060   else
00061    return false;
00062  }
00063 }

00077 class CMFileCSV extends CMError implements CMFile, CMFileMultiReader, CMFileMultiWriter {
00078

00085   return "1.0";

00093  public static function Since() {
00094   return "1.0";
00095  }

00102  public $delimiter = ',';
00103  
00109  public $enclosure = '"';
00110  
00114  private $f = false;
00115  
00119  private $fields = false;
00120  
00126  private $pos = 0;
00127  
00140  public function CMFileCSV($fields = false) {
00141   if($fields !== false) {
00142    if(is_array($fields))
00143     $this->fields = $fields;
00144    else $this->throwWarning("The provided \$fields is not an array",
00145      array('fields' => $fields));
00146   }
00147  }
00148  
00169  public function readFile($uri, $a = false) {
00170   // all we have to do with this function is setup the input file handle
00171   $this->f = fopen($uri, "r");
00172   if(!$this->f) {
00173    $this->throwError("File could not be opened", array('uri' => $uri));
00174    return false;
00175   }
00176    
00177   // $a must be an array
00178   if(!is_array($a))
00179    $a = array($a => true);
00180   
00181   // skip lines
00182   if(isset($a['skip'])) {
00183    for($i = 0; $i < $a['skip']; ++$i)
00184     $this->readNext();
00185   }
00186   
00187   return true;
00188  }
00189  
00203  public function readString($str, $a = false) {
00204   // assign the string to our internal handle with a trailing line, this is very important
00205   $this->f = "$str\n";
00206   
00207   // $a must be an array
00208   if(!is_array($a))
00209    $a = array($a => true);
00210   
00211   // skip lines
00212   if(isset($a['skip'])) {
00213    for($i = 0; $i < $a['skip']; ++$i)
00214     $this->readNext();
00215   }
00216   
00217   return true;
00218  }
00219  
00227  public function getStandardExtensions() {
00228   return array('.csv', '.txt');
00229  }

00258  public function getInternetMediaTypes() {
00259   return array('text/csv', 'text/comma-separated-values');
00260  }

00280  public function readNext($options = false) {
00281   // iterateFile
00282   if(is_resource($this->f) && (get_resource_type($this->f) == 'stream' ||
00283      get_resource_type($this->f) == 'file')) {
00284    // make sure the file handle is open and still got data left
00285    if($this->f === false || feof($this->f))
00286     return false;
00287     
00288    // get and split the data
00289    $r = fgetcsv($this->f, 4096, $this->delimiter, $this->enclosure);
00290   } else {
00291    // grab the next line
00292    $new_pos = strpos($this->f, "\n", $this->pos);
00293    
00294    // return false when we reach the end
00295    if($new_pos === false || $new_pos >= strlen($this->f))
00296     return false;
00297     
00298    $line = substr($this->f, $this->pos, $new_pos - $this->pos);
00299    $r = str_getcsv($line, $this->delimiter, $this->enclosure);
00300    $this->pos = $new_pos + 1;
00301   }
00302    
00303   // map the field names
00304   if($this->fields !== false) {
00305    $newr = array();
00306    for($i = 0; $i < count($r); ++$i)
00307     $newr[$this->fields[$i]] = $r[$i];
00308    $r = $newr;
00309   }
00310   
00311   // trim off the new line if needed
00312   $temp = $r[count($r) - 1];
00313   if(substr($temp, strlen($temp) - 1, 1) == "\n")
00314    $r[count($r) - 1] = substr($temp, 0, strlen($temp) - 1);
00315   
00316   return $r;
00317  }
00318  
00326  public function isBinary() {
00327   return false;

00334  public function __toString() {
00335   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00336  }

00360  public function prepareWriteFile($uri, $a = false) {
00361   // $a must be an array
00362   if(!is_array($a))
00363    $a = array($a => true);
00364   
00365   // this method only has to open the writing file handle
00366   if(isset($a['append']))
00367    $this->f = fopen($uri, "a+");
00368   else $this->f = fopen($uri, "w");
00369   
00370   if($this->f === false)
00371    return $this->throwWarning("The output file could not be opened",
00372       array('uri' => $uri));
00373   
00374   return $this->f !== false;
00375  }
00376  
00396  public function writeNext($item = false) {
00397   // we need an open file handle
00398   if($this->f === false)
00399    return $this->throwError("Item could not be added");
00400    
00401   // item must be an array or we fail
00402   if(!is_array($item))
00403    return $this->throwError("\$item is not an array", array('item' => $item));
00404   
00405   $success = fputcsv($this->f, $item, $this->delimiter, $this->enclosure);
00406   if(!$success)
00407    return $this->throwError("Item could not be added");
00408    
00409   return $success;
00410  }
00411  
00423  public function finishWriteFile($a = array()) {
00424   if($this->f !== false)
00425    fclose($this->f);
00426   return true;
00427  }
00428  
00429 }
